channel.title: Forum Badges
channel.description:
Hey, so I seen this somewhere else about moderators badges and I thought to myself, why not add a few other badges?
I realise that there are a lot of badges for mopar users, but only 3 or 4 of them get used on moparscape, so why not utilize more of them?
For example, the web developer one could be brought in, I think that'd be a good addition so that people could recognize the website developers from the Java programmers. I believe a few could be made for moderators, for example, sectional moderators can get one so that they actually stand out from the community other than when they're posting in their categories/boards. I also believe one for just a general programmer could be brought out, for someone who knows a lot of languages, they don't generally have to be a guru in that language, but good enough to show they know the language well.
As an addition to the moderators badges, I think they should get a name colour too so that they stand out from the rest of the users where it shows the users online. Since the community members have it, I think the mods should too.

item.title: Forum Badges
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

No new discussion, so I’m marking this as resolved. Thanks for the suggestion.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum Badges
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:4, topic:445565”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=548380.msg4020482#msg4020482 date=1339982729]

We already have a web dev badge. As far as staff badges, we’re working one figuring out other things right now that help with that problem as well.

I know you have the badge for website development, the onix one ;). Although, I didn’t realise it was able to be earned on MoparScape. I thought it was just a mitb award?
[/quote]

There’s no such thing as a mitb-only award.[/quote]

I was confused on this due to the topic on MoparScape awards, my bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum Badges
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:3, topic:445565”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=548380.msg4020470#msg4020470 date=1339982385]
We already have a web dev badge. As far as staff badges, we’re working one figuring out other things right now that help with that problem as well.
[/quote]

I know you have the badge for website development, the onix one ;). Although, I didn’t realise it was able to be earned on MoparScape. I thought it was just a mitb award?[/quote]

There’s no such thing as a mitb-only award. There are mitb-only staff badges, but that’s different.

Read full topic
